Perceptor::

Perceptor jumped to a side and fired against the lights and the 
computer's controls, he did that lights turned off and internal 
weapons couldn't open fire against him.

"I wanna see" said Perceptor"what can you do in my world....my dark 
world...."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Sorry sent this to Airly directly twice
> All the while Firestrikes leg crypt to the side.  "Because I like 
to 
> tease those less capable with me.  " In a blur of motion he spun 
> his leg going into a sweep for Perceptors legs.
